com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Class MapBuildingLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapBuildingLayer

  • public final class MapBuildingLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a map layer that enables interactions with extruded buildings. Map.getMapBuildingLayer() This class can be used to find MapBuildingObject and create MapBuildingGroup instances. Please also refer to Map.getMapBuildingLayer().

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MapBuildingLayer.DefaultBuildingColor
      A set of pre-defined colors to change a MapBuildingGroup's color property
      static class  MapBuildingLayer.DefaultBuildingGroups
      Default groups of buildings on the Map.

    • Method Detail

      • getBuilding

        public MapBuildingObject getBuilding(Identifier buildingId,
                            GeoCoordinate positionHint)
        Find a particular building on the Map around the given position.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - Identifier of the building. Obtainable from PlaceLink. This parameter can be null, if it is null it will try to find the building located at positionHint.
        positionHint - GeoCoordinate Approximate location of the building
        Returns:
        MapBuildingObject

      • getBuilding

        public MapBuildingObject getBuilding(Identifier buildingId)
        Find a particular building on the Map
        Parameters:
        buildingId - Identifier of the building. Obtainable from PlaceLink
        Returns:
        MapBuildingObject

      • getDefaultBuildingGroup

        public MapBuildingGroup getDefaultBuildingGroup(MapBuildingLayer.DefaultBuildingGroups group)
        Get a building group of a MapBuildingLayer.DefaultBuildingGroups type. The default building group is a generic group that represents all possible buildings of that type in the entire world.
        Parameters:
        group - One of the values in the enum DefaultBuildingGroups
        Returns:
        MapBuildingGroup

      • createNewBuildingGroup

        public MapBuildingGroup createNewBuildingGroup()
        Create a new MapBuildingGroup for custom building selection.
        Returns:
        MapBuildingGroup. By default, a new MapBuildingGroup has the MapBuildingGroup with color MapBuildingLayer.DefaultBuildingColor.SELECTED. At run time, there can only be a maximum number of MapBuildingGroups, when the limit is reached, no new no new MapBuildingGroup can be created unless some are being freed up by calling releaseBuildingGroup(MapBuildingGroup).

        See Also:
        to delete an unused {@link MapBuildingGroup}.

      • createNewBuildingGroup

        public MapBuildingGroup createNewBuildingGroup(MapBuildingLayer.DefaultBuildingColor color)
        Create a new MapBuildingGroup with the given color for custom building selection.
        Parameters:
        color - Color of buildings in the new MapBuildingGroup
        Returns:
        MapBuildingGroup. Returns null if no more new MapBuildingGroup can be created. At run time, there is a maximum number of MapBuildingGroups created. When the limit is reached, no new MapBuildingGroup can be created unless some are being freed up by calling releaseBuildingGroup(MapBuildingGroup).
        See Also:
        to delete an unused {@link MapBuildingGroup}.

      • releaseBuildingGroup

        public void releaseBuildingGroup(MapBuildingGroup group)
        Release the MapBuildingGroup created for custom building selection.
        Parameters:
        group - The MapBuildingGroup to be released. The MapBuildingGroup instance becomes invalid and unusable again.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if group is a default MapBuildingGroup retrieved from getDefaultBuildingGroup(DefaultBuildingGroups).
        See Also:
        to create a new {@link MapBuildingGroup}.
